title: Is the JEE Main enough for NIT? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes definitely , NIT admission is completely based on your JEE Main rankings. But keep in mind that there is reservation for home state students. Like take an example that cutoff for you may be around 2000 while that for home students may go upto 4000 depending on stream
Yes, JEE Mains is the ONLY criteria for admissions to NITs along with the minimum board percentage required.
